title: Veins of the Earth (2024)
body:
Developed from *Resonant Landscapes* field recordings, this eight-channel work explores ecological interdependence through spatialized textures of wind, water, and wildlife. The composition invites immersive, contemplative listening and continues my research into ecologically informed electroacoustic practice.
Tate Carson 1 · Veins Of The Earth - Stereo
## P﻿erformances * ﻿Resonant Landscapes concert at The Brick House, Madison, SD, March 2024*﻿ * New York City Electroacoustic Music Festival, June 2025.
